snippet.title: Sega Dreamcast | ECW Anarchy Rulz | Trailer
snippet.description: ECW Anarchy Rulz is a professional wrestling video game released by Acclaim Entertainment in 2000 based on Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW). It was released for the PlayStation and Dreamcast. The game is the sequel to ECW Hardcore Revolution, which was released in January 2000, and the last ECW game released by Acclaim, or any developer. Acclaim would later start another wrestling game series with the release of Legends of Wrestling in December 2001.
